problem_text: Figure 22-49 shows three circular arcs centered on the origin of a coordinate system. On each arc, the uniformly distributed charge is given in terms of $Q=2.00 \mu \mathrm{C}$. The radii are given in terms of $R=10.0 \mathrm{~cm}$. What is the magnitude of the net electric field at the origin due to the arcs?
